Subject: Hola
Body: How are you? Good to see you here. Do you wanna meet up?

Subject: Hola Back
Body: Ummmm just to be sure you know I am not looking for an ever after!

Subject: Oops
Body: I am not big on rules. Do you still wanna meet up?

Subject: Oops Back
Body: As long as there are no misunderstandings. Yes Lets meet up.
